quagga.input.subject: Enron On-line-AHC Trading
quagga.input.body:
----- Forwarded by Tana Jones/HOU/ECT on 03/22/2001 04:24 PM -----

	"Dellacona, Dana (Commodities - NY)" <ddellacona@Hess.com>
	03/22/2001 04:21 PM
		 
		 To: "'tana.jones@enron.com'" <tana.jones@enron.com>
		 cc: "Cerria, Chuck (Commodities - NY)" <ccerria@Hess.com>, "Lovvorn, Kelly" 
<klovvorn@Hess.com>
		 Subject: Enron On-line-AHC Trading


Tana,

This confirms our conversation today regarding Amerada Hess Corporation's
ability to trade on Enron On-line.  As discussed, I will check to see what
specific products we intend to trade with regard to Energy, Physicals,
and/or Derivatives.  I will also check to see whether we intend to trade in
the US, Canada, and/or Europe. I do understand that you cannot give me an
accurate answer as to our ability to trade On-line until I provide this to
you.  Thank you for getting back to me so quickly, I will try to do the
same.

Regards,

Dana M. Dellacona
1185 Avenue of the Americas
NY, NY 10036
Ph:212.536.8133
Fx:917.342.8810
ddellacona@hess.com
